description: Returns the descriptions of all the current mount targets, or a specific mount target, for a file system. When requesting all of the current mount targets, the order of mount targets returned in the response is unspecified. This operation requires permissions for the elasticfilesystem:DescribeMountTargets action, on either the file system ID that you specify in FileSystemId, or on the file system of the mount target that you specify in MountTargetId.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: If the request included the Marker, the response returns that value in this field.

nested_items.name: MountTargets
nested_items.description: Returns the file system's mount targets as an array of MountTargetDescription objects.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the resource.

nested_items.name: FileSystemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the file system for which the mount target is intended.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the mount target's subnet.

nested_items.name: LifeCycleState
nested_items.description: Lifecycle state of the mount target.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: Address at which the file system can be mounted by using the mount target.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the network interface that Amazon EFS created when it created the mount target.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneId
nested_items.description: The unique and consistent identifier of the Availability Zone that the mount target resides in. For example, use1-az1 is an AZ ID for the us-east-1 Region and it has the same location in every Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneName
nested_items.description: The name of the Availability Zone in which the mount target is located. Availability Zones are independently mapped to names for each Amazon Web Services account. For example, the Availability Zone us-east-1a for your Amazon Web Services account might not be the same location as us-east-1a for another Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) ID that the mount target is configured in.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If a value is present, there are more mount targets to return. In a subsequent request, you can provide Marker in your request with this value to retrieve the next set of mount targets.
